item.description:
Less than two weeks to the Wings and Wheels event!

A lot of work has been completed to get ready for the show, but there are still a few details to be worked out. Please join me at Bullock's hangar for pizza Friday night at 6pm and help get us ready.

If you plan to attend the show to help, it would be beneficial to come and find out what will be happening and what you can do.

Please RSVP so I know how much pizza to bring.

Thanks!
Matt

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Wings and Wheels Final Planning and info Meeting
